TopicTitle: My rocket builder group isnt getting posts.

Articles.Content: Help on getting it noticed? If your confused this is it ---------> http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68918-Ufj-United-federation-of-jool

Oh, nobody has replied to my post in an hour, why don't I make another thread asking people to comment on it?

Imagine how it would be if we all thought like that.

._.

Sorry, I can be impatient when I work on something for a while and nobody notices it.
Oh, don't worry. I know that feeling.
Maybe it would help if I added pictures of the Jool Station?
Pictures are always good, as long as you don't have too many.
